Trustworthiness of AI

We develop mathematically grounded methods to ensure the safety, correctness, and reliability of AI systems.

Learn More

X-Small Language Models

We build compact, trustworthy domain-specific LLMs that achieve high interpretability and safer decision-making.

Ophtimus Series

Medical AI

Our medical AI research focuses on ophthalmology, clinical decision support, and robust diagnostic modeling.

See Projects

Robot AI

We study safe autonomous driving, F1TENTH robotics, and real-time AI behavior under uncertainty.

Our AV Team

About Us

The Cyber Safety Lab at Gyeongsang National University is committed to advancing the safety and trustworthiness of modern intelligent systems. We develop methods to ensure the reliability of CPS, medical AI, and autonomous driving AI through formal verification and practical software engineering.

 Research

We conduct research on the safety of software systems.

 Education

We provide education in AI, formal methods, and software engineering.

 Development

We develop medical AI and autonomous driving software for racing.

 Competition

We compete with other teams to build safer and more reliable software.

News

Updates from the Cyber Safety Lab, including research progress, publications, and people-related achievements.

Research Highlights

The Cyber Safety Lab continues advancing research in AI Safety, Medical AI, and Cyber-Physical Systems. Ongoing work includes the preparation of four SCI(E) publications expected to appear in 2025.

People & Alumni News

  • Minwook Kwon (M.S., Aug. 2025) joined Public AI as an AI engineer.
  • Seungju Baek (M.S., Mar. 2025) joined Saltlux, contributing significantly to our Ophtimus research series.

What our collaborators say

We work closely with clinicians and autonomous driving researchers in Korea and abroad.

Our clinical collaborators often describe our group as one of the key experts in applying AI to medicine, especially in ophthalmology.

Ophthalmology collaborators

Colleagues in autonomous driving research recognize us as specialists in the F1TENTH platform and one of the leading teams in Korean autonomous racing.

Autonomous driving collaborators

Contact Us

We would love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, need further information about our research, or want to collaborate with us, please feel free to get in touch.
